content: this tapestry crochet **bunny potholder** is part of my ** a year of potholders 1 collection** for this collection i will be releasing a tapestry crochet potholder pattern every month for the entire 2022 being made in tapestry crochet this potholder is compact doesn t have any holes and is very functional **materials** 3 5-mm e/4 usa 9 uk crochet hook aran 4 medium cotton yarn tapestry needle **gauge** 22 5 single_crochet for 21 row in 4 10 cm worked in tapestry crochet **size** 6 2 15 7 cm by 6 3 16 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusadesigns com/a-year-of-tapestry-crochet-potholders/ 2 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 3 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
